content:
Authority:
  Organization: CDISC
Check:
      all:
        - name: "--SOCCD"
          operator: "is_not_contained_by"
          value: "$MedDRA_SOCCD"
           
References:
  - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
    Version: "2.0"
    Rule Identifier:
        Id: CG0437
        Version: "1"
Description: Verify that --SOCCD matches MedDRA primary system organ class code
Sensitivity: Value
Severity: Error                     :
Scopes:
  Standards:
    - Name: SDTMIG
      Version: "3.4"
  Classes:
    # {Source Class: EVT}
    Include:
      - Events
  Domains:
    # {Source Domains: AE, MH, CE}
    Include:
      - AE
      - MH
      - CE
#need operator/function to cross check and verify dataset --SOCCD against MedDRA SOCCD (any dictionary #lookup) ,drafting using the logic of the cross dataset check for now
Rule Type: External Dictionaries  
 
Operations:
  - operator: "distinct"
    domain: "<MedDRA>"
    name: "SOCCD"
    id: "$<MedDRA>_SOCCD"
Outcome:
  Message: --SOCCD must equal MedDRA primary system organ class --SOCCD
Citations:
  - Document: Model v2.0
    Section: Events
    Item: --SOCCD
    Cited Guidance: >-
      The system organ class code from the primary hierarchy assigned in the MedDRA dictionary.
